title: Modway Prospect Channel Tufted Performance Velvet Loveseat and Armchair Set, White
features: Modern Barrel Back Loveseat and Armchair Set
description: A fresh outlook on a familiar classic, Prospect Performance Velvet Loveseat and Armchair Set brings intrinsic luxury to your living space. This barrel back set comes upholstered in stain-resistant performance velvet fabric, and boasts chic channel tufting, updating the Chesterfield-inspired profile with retro modern design elements. The densely padded removable seat and backrest grant approachable comfort that beckons guests to sit and stay a while. Loveseat and Armchair Weight Capacity: 331 lbs
